name: Simple Redirection
author: N.O.U.S. Open Useful and Simple

sections.description: Simply redirect all pages to a specified URL, can be used for temporary or permanently redirect
sections.installation:
1. Upload eelv_redirection.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress admin
  3. Go to the configuration page to configure your redirection
sections.faq:
Does this plugin add a 301 header ?

yes, and 302 to

v 1.0
